AND m.type !=#{filterType}

SELECT m.*, m.name AS "Meta.title", m.icon AS "Meta.icon" FROM sys_menu m JOIN ( SELECT DISTINCT ra.menu_id FROM sys_user_role ur JOIN sys_role_menu ra ON ur.role_id = ra.role_id JOIN sys_user u ON ur.user_id = u.ID WHERE u.USERNAME = 'admin' ) AS um ON m.id = um.menu_id WHERE m.del_flag = 0 AND m.type != '2'

SELECT m.* FROM sys_menu m JOIN ( SELECT DISTINCT ra.menu_id FROM sys_user_role ur JOIN sys_role_menu ra ON ur.role_id = ra.role_id WHERE ur.user_id = #{userId} ) AS um ON m.id = um.menu_id WHERE m.permission is not null AND m.permission !=''
SELECT m.* FROM sys_menu m JOIN sys_role_menu rm ON m.id = rm.menu_id WHERE rm.role_id = #{roleId}
SELECT menu_id FROM sys_role_menu WHERE role_id=#{roleId}
